@QAInfo(level=NORMAL,
        state=IN_DEVELOPMENT,
        author="te")
public abstract class ReplaceReader
extends java.io.FilterReader
implements TextTransformer, java.lang.Cloneable

Abstract class providing basic methods for making a TextTransformer that is also a Reader.

setSource

public ReplaceReader setSource(java.io.Reader source)
Reset the replace reader and prepare it for reading from source. What ever replacement rules the replace reader is enforcing remains unchanged.
